oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Optimierung von Produktionssystemen im ökologischen Gemüse
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Definition of the problem: -Need to know more about organic varieties -Labour intensive cropping systems Project aims including target group: To optimize organic vegetable growing: -the use of organic seeds - experiments with fertilizer and other organic inputs - comparing different cropping systems in onion growing Vegetable growers Methodology: On farm experiments
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} Optimierung von Produktionssystemen im ökologischen Gemüse. [Optimization of production systems of organic vegetable growing.] Runs 2002 - 2006. Project Leader(s): Koller, Martin, Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL), CH-5070 Frick.
